summary: 2003 COBRA.  VEHICLE STALLS DURING DECELERATION. TYPICAL SCENARIO INVOLVES LIGHT TO MODERATE BRAKING WHILE OUT OF GEAR. CLUTCH ENGAGEMENT WILL NOT RECOVER CAR. BRAKES RAPIDLY FADE AND VEHICLE LOSES STEERING CAPABILITY. OCCURRED AT LEAST 2-3 TIMES A WEEK FROM DATE OF PURCHASE, JULY 02.  ABATED DURING WINTER MONTHS AND RETAINED IN SPRING.  DEALER DUPLICATED STALL BUT NO REPAIR AVAILABLE. STILL STALLS TO DATE.    *TT
